hotels.title: One of China’s Top Golf Resorts: Dongguan Luxury with Seven Golf Courses & Daily Breakfast
hotels.description: Tucked within the scenic expanse of National Forest Park, this eco-friendly haven feels a world away from the everyday. With access to seven world-class golf courses shared with its sister resort in Shenzhen, days are spent teeing off on legendary fairways designed by icons like Nicklaus, Faldo, Els and Singh, before returning to the unparalleled luxury of Mission Hills Resort Dongguan. When you’re not out on the fairways, take advantage of this leisure paradise, where a sprawling outdoor pool with an obstacle water park, a heated indoor pool and the impressive Forest Springs Spa await. With three onsite dining venues, there’s no need to step outside - enjoy laid-back bites at Mélange, international favourites at World Kitchen and fine-dining Cantonese at Tao Yuan Restaurant.
